meta.title: Extended Closure Distance Learning Menus for Elementary Learners — Maine Regional School Unit 21

meta.content: Extended Closure Distance Learning Menus for Elementary Learners — Maine Regional School Unit 21

Thank you for your patience and hard work in helping RSU 21's youngest learners succeed with distance learning.  A few important items of note:  Our  final version of menus  includes additional resources and is organized within focus areas for each content. Yo

Education Foundation of the Kennebunks and Arundel

div.div: The Middle School of the Kennebunks

div.a: FAQ on Role and Powers of School Board
Education Foundation of the Kennebunks and Arundel

article.class: entry h-entry hentry author-jen-foy post-type-text clear

h1.a: Extended Closure Distance Learning Menus for Elementary Learners

div.p: Thank you for your patience and hard work in helping RSU 21's youngest learners succeed with distance learning.
A few important items of note:

li.p: Our final version of menus includes additional resources and is organized within focus areas for each content. You can find them here: https://www.rsu21.net/distance-learning-plans
RSU 21 will be putting out a survey next Monday for families next week to gauge our effectiveness with distance learning and help inform revisions.

We have expanded offerings for elementary students. Counselors are available to video conference with students on an as-needed basis, teachers will be sharing more asynchronous videos, and expanded content as well as the ability to utilize phone calls to connect with families.

div.p: Please stay in touch with your child's teacher, building principal, or interim assistant superintendent if you have additional questions about distance learning.

span.data-title: Extended Closure Distance Learning Menus for Elementary Learners

a.span: National Survey: Kennebunk High School is #2 in Maine
